    • loginUser

      public void loginUser(String username, String password)
      Description copied from interface: UserService
      Gets the user info for a given username and password, then sets the current user to the gotten user object. If any input is empty or not the same as the database, current user will be set to null
      Specified by:
      loginUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:

      password - password

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String username, String password, String email, String userFirstName, String userLastName, boolean premium)
      Description copied from interface: UserService
      Add a user to the database and then sets the current user into the new user. If any input is empty or the username is already in database, new user won't be added to database and current user will be set to null
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      username - username
      password - password
      email - email
      userFirstName - userFirstName
      userLastName - userLastName
      premium - premium
